mapper.sql: FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO B LEFT JOIN SPORT_DRAW_FB A ON A.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN SPORT_DATA_FB_SP C ON C.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN LOTTERY_ISSUE E ON E.ISSUE_CODE = B.ISSUE_CODE AND E.LOTTERY_CODE = B.LOTTERY_CODE LEFT JOIN SPORT_MATCH_INFO M ON M.ID = B.SPORT_MATCH_INFO_ID AND M.MATCH_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO H ON H.ID = B.HOME_TEAM_ID AND H.TEAM_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN SPORT_TEAM_INFO G ON G.ID = B.VISITI_TEAM_ID AND G.TEAM_TYPE=1 LEFT JOIN SPORT_STATUS_FB I ON I.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID = B.ID WHERE 1=1 AND B.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT B.ID AS againstId , B.ISSUE_CODE AS issueCode, B.SYSTEM_CODE AS systemCode, B.START_TIME AS startTime, B.MATCH_STATUS AS matchStatus, B.MATCH_ANALYSIS_URL AS analysisUrl, B.OFFICIAL_ID AS officialId, A.HALF_SCORE AS halfScore, A.FULL_SCORE AS fullScore, E.SALE_STATUS AS saleStatus, M.MATCH_FULL_NAME AS matchFullName, M.MATCH_SHORT_NAME AS matchShortName, H.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS homeTeamFullName, H.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS homeTeamShortName, G.TEAM_FULL_NAME AS guestTeamFullName, G.TEAM_SHORT_NAME AS guestTeamShortName, B.IS_RECOMMEND AS isRecommend
ORDER BY B.SYSTEM_CODE DESC,B.ID DESC

SELECT A.SYSTEM_CODE, A.HOME_NAME, A.VISITI_NAME, A.START_TIME, B.HALF_SCORE, B.FULL_SCORE, B.FULL_SPF, B.LET_SPF, B.LET_NUM, B.SCORE, B.GOAL_NUM, B.HF_WDF FROM SPORT_AGAINST_INFO A LEFT JOIN SPORT_DRAW_FB B ON A.ID = B.SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID WHERE A.LOTTERY_CODE = #{lotteryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.SYSTEM_CODE IN (${systemCode}) ORDER BY FIELD(A.SYSTEM_CODE, ${systemCode})
mapper.insert: insert into SPORT_DRAW_FB (SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, HALF_SCORE, FULL_SCORE, FULL_SPF, LET_SPF, LET_NUM, SCORE, GOAL_NUM, HF_WDF, DRAW_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME) values (#{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{halfScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{letSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{letNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hfWdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into SPORT_DRAW_FB (ID,SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, HALF_SCORE, FULL_SCORE, FULL_SPF, LET_SPF, LET_NUM, SCORE, GOAL_NUM, HF_WDF, DRAW_TIME, MODIFY_BY, MODIFY_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sportAgainstInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{halfScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{letSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{letNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hfWdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE HALF_SCORE = #{halfScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_SCORE = #{fullScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_SPF = #{fullSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LET_SPF = #{letSpf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LET_NUM = #{letNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOAL_NUM = #{goalNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HF_WDF = #{hfWdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAW_TIME = #{drawTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = now()
mapper.select: SELECT sai.id as SPORT_AGAINST_INFO_ID, sai.match_status,sai.official_id, sdf.half_score, sdf.full_score, sdf.full_spf, sdf.hf_wdf, sdf.goal_num FROM sport_against_info sai JOIN sport_draw_fb sdf on sai.id=sdf.sport_against_info_id WHERE sai.lottery_code=#{lotteryCode, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND sai.match_status=#{matchStatus, jdbcType=TINYINT} AND sdf.half_score IS NOT NULL AND sdf.half_score !='' AND sdf.full_score IS NOT NULL AND sdf.full_score !=''
